title: Gorgeous semi renovated loft, stainless steel appliances
posting_body: University Commons at NorthridgeConveniently located walking distance from the CSUN campus, University Commons at Northridge offers the best in contemporary living.
Our newly restored apartment homes feature all the amenities you need to enjoy a carefree and comfortable lifestyle.
This pet-friendly community features exceptional on-site management, a sparkling swimming pool, relaxing Jacuzzi, an on-site laundry facility, and assigned parking.
Choose from a variety of entertainment and dining at Northridge Fashion Center or shop until you drop at The Galleria.
Enjoy a day excursion at the Northridge Recreation Center or the CSUN Botanic Garden.
When you live at the University Commons Apartments, there is never a dull moment with all of the local hotspots to keep you busy.
Come and visit us, and see why life at the University Commons is truly a step above the rest!
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798
